题目任务: 在数轴上找到0.21的准确位置
题目描述: 给定一个标有十分位和百分位的数轴。数轴从0到1，其中每个大刻度代表一个十分位，每个小刻度代表一个百分位。
任务: 说明0.21位于哪两个十分位之间
计算并标出0.21具体位于哪个百分位
提示: Place the number on this number line, but you can still use the top number line if you want.
This number line is zoomed between 0.2 and 0.3, so you are already at the correct tenths. You must find the correct hundredths.
Place the number on this number line. Look at how many tenths are in 0.21? Then, look at how many hundredths.
There are 2 tenths, and 1 hundredths. The number is hidden 1 hundredths AFTER 0.2 tickmark! To get these hundredths, imagine another ten division between the 0.2 and 0.3 tickmarks.
Count 2 tickmark(s) to the right of 0, and go 1 hundredths parts more. Note that 0.21 is close to 0.2.
You know that 0.21 is between 0.2 and 0.3, but where is it closer? Is it closer to 0.2? 0.3? How about the middle, 0.25?
If this is difficult to do, why don't you try zooming in?
